description:
This great 1 bedroom is located in the heart of Bushwick, close to all the cool bars and restaurants around the Jefferson and Morgan L. 25 min ride to the city so super convenient!!

Wifi and roku available.
Coffee grinder and coffee press, anything in the fridge you're very welcome to as well.

Tons of bars and restaurants, lots of options for late night eats and drinks! Laundromat right around the corner, and 24/7 grocery store 1 1/2 blocks away. Coffee shops close as well!

6 minute walk to the Jefferson L or Central M station, 25 minute commute into the city with either.
name: Spacious 1 bedroom in Bushwick
review: Great location, Great place. Super cute and clean. Had everything I needed. Easy to get to the city and cool spots to check out in the neighborhood. Mariana was a great host,  very easy to communicate and coordinate with.  Definitely recommend
